item.title: How well Did Cam Newton fill in Tom Brady's spot in his first season as a Patriot?
Jordan Saadeh Sports Blog
item.description: Welcome to my first blog post, I hope youâ€™re as excited as I am as I document my thoughts, questions, and answers to those questions. I will as well be giving updates on my project that I will be working on, whether that is of I think found some fascinating that I never knew and want to share or anything else in that matter. The first question I look forward to answering in my first project is: Why the New England Patriots need Tom Brady at quarterback to win a Super Bowl.

item.title: About Jordan Saadeh
item.description: Hey I’m Jordan Saadeh and welcome to my sports blog. This is where I will be answering the biggest sports questions in the world today through analytics and data. A little about myself, I am currently a 20 year old at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln where I am majoring in Sports Media and Communications. I am originally from the Twin Cities area in Minnesota so it is dafe to say that I am big Minnesota Sports fan.
